titles.title: A bill to provide that certain good faith transfers of property made by the Southern Industrial Banking Corporations to depositors shall not be voidable under title 11 of the United States Code.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 2/5/1987--Introduced. Provides that certain good faith transfers of property to depositors by the Southern Industrial Banking Corporation (doing business as Daveco) shall not be voidable under Federal bankruptcy law.
